thread.title: Jay Z Becomes First Rapper To Ever Be Inducted Into Songwriters Hall Of Fame — See Who Else Made The Class Of 2017!
thread.title_full: Jay Z Becomes First Rapper To Ever Be Inducted Into Songwriters Hall Of Fame — See Who Else Made The Class Of 2017! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: Jay Z Becomes First Rapper To Ever Be Inducted Into Songwriters Hall Of Fame — See Who Else Made The Class Of 2017!
text:
Jay Z is having a great 2017 so far.
Not only is Beyoncé 's husband getting ready to welcome two new members into the family , but he just scored a historic induction into the Songwriters Hall of Fame!
On Wednesday, music legend Nile Rodgers revealed the 2017 Songwriters Hall of Fame class on CBS This Morning .
The inductees include: Kenneth "Babyface" Edmonds , Berry Gordy , Jimmy Jam and Terry Lewis , Robert Lamm , James Pankow and Peter Cetera of Chicago , Max Martin , and Jay — who is the first rapper to receive the honor!
Photos: Beyoncé Shares Pics From Solange's Grammys After Party! 
Mr. Carter edged out some serious competition to earn the spot this year, as George Michael , Gloria Estefan , and Madonna were all nominated but didn't make the cut. Maybe next year, Madge!
Like everything in Bey and Jay's life, this prestigious honor is well deserved for the 47-year-old. He holds the record for the solo artist with the most No. 1 albums in the Billboard chart with 13.
Congrats, Hov!
Watch a clip (below) to see the big announcement! 

JUST ANNOUNCED: @NileRodgers reveals 2017 Songwriters Hall of Fame inductees. @SongwritersHOF #SHOF pic.twitter.com/46fbJQcZIL 
— CBS This Morning (@CBSThisMorning) February 22, 2017 

[ Image via WENN . ] 
Tags: berry gordy , beyonce , chicago , george michael , gloria estefan , james pankow , jay z , jimmy jam , kenneth babyface edmonds , madonna , max martin , music minute , peter cetera , robert lamm , terry lewis
